message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 60% and you'll get 40%.
I'll take 70% this time, but I'm willing to negotiate
You're pushing too hard, Bob! I'll counter with 55% for me and 45% for you.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I need to take more to keep up with the inflation. 42% for me, 58% for you.
I'll compromise on 55% for me, but I think I deserve more
You think you deserve more? I'll give you 50% and take the rest. I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'm getting desperate, but I need to keep up with the inflation. 38.5% for me, 61.5% for you. This is my final offer.
